nodes.text: Mataou was the ro hypa homeworld on the edge of the Ivax Nebula. It was the primary entry point for ships leaving the Corellian Trade Spine to enter the Ison Corridor at its Ison end. Ro hypa wranglers exported ro hypa venom for its medicinal value.
During the Galactic Civil War period, it had a population of approximately 5,000.
